name: Snowbangers
description:
Christmas Jam 2018 submission.

Snowbangers is a game about failing to build increasingly elaborate snowmen.

Move: WASD
Look: Mouse
Jump: Space
Finalize: E

Music:
"DarxieLand" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
